sourceMeaningMnemonic: You've been ordered to <radical>spear</radical> this <radical>tree</radical> but you decide to be really <kanji>gentle</kanji> instead.
meaningInfo: Imagine gently poking the tree with your spear. You glance around nervously, hoping no one notices how easy on it you're being.
readingMnemonic: You're being really <kanji>gentle</kanji> to the tree when a <reading>jewel</reading> (<ja>じゅう</ja>) falls out of its branches and hits you on the head.
readingInfo: The jewel has a little note on it, "Thank you for being gentle." Did... did the tree just reward you for being gentle?!
